title: Hikawa Maru Monogatari
synopsis: Hirayama Jirou has lost his mother in the Great Kanto Earthquake and now runs a soba stall with his father. He decides to join the crew of the famous ocean liner Hikawa Maru and finds work cooking in the ship's galley. Through his eyes, the film explores the ship's 85-year history.
staff: [['Miura, Kouji', ['Script']], ['Oda, Kazumasa', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Konno, Yasuyuki', ['Sound Effects']], ['Takehara, Kenji', ['Director of Photography']]]
